title: I Am The Wild
description: I thought I was ordinary. More or less.In the wake of my twin brother's death, I was left bereft and broke, looking for a new start to life.That's when I saw the ad.That's when I met them.That's when I signed on the dotted line.That's when I discovered there is more in this world than I ever knew.Vampires.Monsters.Magic.But I haven't discovered everything.I haven't discovered my own truth.Not yet.All I know is that in my dreamsâ€¦I am the woman in the wild.I am the blood sister of the moon. The Night brothers need me, and not just to help with their paranormal law firm in The Otherworld.They are being pulled into darkness.And I will be the light to guide them out.En lumen, et lumen.Be in the light and of the light.If only I can stay alive long enough.But I'm not as easy to kill as I once thought.I may not know what I am, but I know this.I am the wild.And I will be the light this world needs.* This is a reverse harem novel.
author: Karpov Kinrade
